700370f-a.title: Bronx: 247th Street (West) - Palisade Avenue
700370f-a.text:
West 247th Street, north side, between Palisade Ave. and the
Hudson River (near tracks of the New York Central Railroad), showing
the Canal Street Cottage. This cottage stood originally on Canal Street,
Manhattan, and was floated up on a canal boat and re-erected on its
present location in Riverdale. For additional data see Randall Comfort'a
History of Bronx Borough, p.19.
19O1.
Randall Comfort.
